en.banner_brief_mobile: The UOS deployment system becomes simpler.
en.banner_describe: UOS Director is a set of tools for deploying and managing OpenStack clusters, community-based OpenStack TripleO development, which is highly deterministic and controllable.
en.feature_four_intro: The deployment is delivered in a number of ways
en.feature_one_intro: Can quickly deploy the entire cluster
en.feature_two_intro: Arranging templates to makeclusters highly accurate
en.show_one_introduction: Do not repeat the wheel, UOS Director take full advantage of OpenStack existing services to complete UOS platform deployment.
en.show_three_introduction: Customized by node roles, you can customize a variety of deployment architectures and support service expansion, perfect integration of external systems.
en.show_two_introduction: In the deterministic hardware and network topology, can achieve a key deployment of rapid deployment of UOS platform.
en.solve_four_intro: Bare machine management, centralized management of cluster information
en.solve_four_introduction: UOS Director enables bare metal management capabilities through the community Ironic project, manages the entire lifecycle of physical servers in the cluster, and automatically collects server parameters, topology.
en.solve_one_intro: Integrate TripleO to improve delivery efficiency
en.solve_one_introduction: Due to the huge and complex system of OpenStack, its delivery has long been a difficult problem to solve. UOS Director making the deployment of a high degree of certainty, improve deployment efficiency.
en.solve_two_intro: Role customization, flexible custom deployment architecture
en.solve_two_introduction: UOS Director through the role of the role can be flexible to customize the cloud environment will be deployed, specify which roles contain what services, More flexible customization of your environment.
en.solve_three_intro: Network customization, flexible custom network topology
en.solve_three_introduction: The most complex of OpenStack is the network architecture. UOS Director takes advantage of the networking capabilities provided by Neutron to abstract the cluster into multiple networks.
en.title: UnitedStack - UOS Director

zh.banner_brief_mobile: 将 UOS 部署系统，变得简单化。
zh.banner_describe: UOS Director 是一套用来部署和管理 OpenStack 集群的工具集，基于社区的 OpenStack TripleO 开发，它将复杂 UOS 系统的部署交付变得简单化，具有高度的确定性和可控性。
zh.feature_four_intro: 抽象封装部署过程，提炼出 API，部署以多种方式交付。
zh.feature_one_intro: 简化部署步骤，可快速部署整个集群，以及扩容缩容。
zh.feature_three_intro: 通过制定节点角色，可灵活定制部署架构。
zh.feature_two_intro: 编排模板整合配置管理工具，使部署集群有高度确确性。
zh.show_one_introduction: 不重复造轮子，UOS Director 充分利用 OpenStack 现有服务完成 UOS 平台部署。
zh.show_three_introduction: 通过节点角色定制，可灵活定制多种部署架构，并且支持服务扩展，完美整合外部系统。
zh.show_two_introduction: 在确定性的硬件以及网络拓扑下，可实现一键部署快速部署 UOS 平台。
zh.solve_four_intro: 裸机管理，集中管理集群信息
zh.solve_four_introduction: UOS Director 通过社区 Ironic 项目实现了裸机管理能力，可以管理集群中物理服务器的整个生命周期，并且通过 Introspection 功能，自动收集服务器参数，拓扑结构等，这为管理整个集群提供了无限可能。
zh.solve_one_intro: 整合 TripleO，提高交付效率
zh.solve_one_introduction: 由于 OpenStack 庞大复杂的系统，其交付长久以来是一个难以解决的问题，UOS Director 基于社区 TripleO 项目开发，通过编排模板定制整个系统，使得部署有高度确定性，提高部署效率。
zh.solve_two_intro: 角色定制，灵活定制部署架构
zh.solve_two_introduction: UOS Director 通过节点角色(Role)能够灵活的定制将要部署的云环境，可以指定哪些节点承担什么角色，除了本身包含一些默认的节点角色之外，还可以自定义角色，指定哪些角色包含哪些服务，更加灵活的定制你的环境。
zh.solve_three_intro: 网络定制，灵活定制网络拓扑
zh.solve_three_introduction: OpenStack 中最复杂的是网络架构，UOS Director 充分利用 Neutron 提供的组网功能，将集群抽象出多个网络，包括管理网，外部网络，内部网络，存储网络，租户网络等，这些网络划分能够很灵活的满足 OpenStack 所需的各种网络定制需求。
zh.title: UnitedStack - UOS Director
